data.message: Missing declaration of the version of UBL

customization.description: Identifies the earliest version of the UBL 2 schema for this document type that defines all of the elements that might be encountered in the current instance.

data.message: Invoice Type Code not specified or value specified is not allowed.

customization.bpcTerm: Invoice and Credit Note Type Code
customization.description: A code specifying the functional type of the Invoice.

data.message: Document Currency Code not specified or value specified is not allowed.

customization.bpcTerm: Invoice and Credit Note Currency Code
customization.description: The currency in which all Invoice amounts are given

data.message: Tax Currency Code value specified is not allowed.

customization.description: A code signifying the currency used for tax amounts in the Invoice.

data.message: More than one project reference exists.

customization.description: The identification of the project the invoice refers to.

data.message: More than one contract number exists.

customization.description: The identification of a contract.

data.message: Purchase order reference cannot be specified more than once.

customization.description: An identifier of a referenced purchase order, issued by the Buyer.

data.message: More than one proof of delivery reference exists.

customization.description: An identifier of a referenced receiving advice.

data.assertionPrototype: if( count( cbc:SettlementDiscountPercent ) > 0 or count( cbc:SettlementDiscountAmount ) > 0 or count( cbc:Amount ) > 0 ) then ( count( cbc:SettlementDiscountPercent ) = 1 and count( cbc:SettlementDiscountAmount ) = 1 and count( cbc:Amount ) = 1 ) else true()
data.message: Payment Terms Discount Percent, Payment Terms Discount Amount or Basis for Terms Discount do not exist when one of the terms is provided.

customization.description: A group of business terms providing information about the payment.

data.message: More than one invoice note exists.

customization.description: A textual note that gives unstructured information that is relevant to the Invoice as a whole.

data.message: More than one invoiced object identifier exists.

customization.description: A group of business terms providing information on the invoice period.

data.message: Missing Invoicing Period Start Date and/or Invoicing Period End Date.

customization.description: The date on which Invoice or Credit Memo period starts. All dates are inclusive.

data.assertionPrototype: if ( count(cbc:StartTime) = 0 and count(cbc:EndTime) = 0 ) then (:date, no time:) ( dateTime(cbc:EndDate,xsd:time('00:00:00')) >= dateTime(cbc:StartDate,xsd:time('00:00:00')) ) else if ( count(cbc:StartTime) =1 and count(cbc:EndTime) = 1 ) then (:date and time:) ( dateTime(cbc:EndDate,cbc:EndTime) >= dateTime(cbc:StartDate,cbc:StartTime) ) else false()
data.message: Invoicing Period is incomplete or the end is before the Invoicing Period start.

customization.description: The date on which the Invoice or Credit Memo period ends. All dates are inclusive.

data.message: Business process type not specified or value specified is not valid.

customization.description: Identifies the business process context in which the transaction appears, to enable the Buyer to process the Invoice in an appropriate way. It would point to which implementation guide to use in the U.S. Semantic Model .

data.message: Session Identifier is not specified or exists more than once.

customization.description: Identifies an instance of executing a profile, to associate all transactions in a collaboration.

data.message: Specification Identifier not specified or value specified is not valid.

customization.description: An identification of the specification containing the total set of rules regarding semantic content, cardinalities and business rules to which the data contained in the instance document conforms.

data.message: Specification Identifier not specified or value specified is not valid.

customization.description: An identification of the specification containing the total set of rules regarding semantic content, cardinalities and business rules to which the data contained in the instance document conforms.

data.message: Specification Identifier not specified or value specified is not valid.

customization.description: An identification of the specification containing the total set of rules regarding semantic content, cardinalities and business rules to which the data contained in the instance document conforms.

data.message: Preceding Invoice Number is not specified or exists more than once if Preceding Invoice Reference is provided.

ubldens.ublden: Billing Reference. Invoice_ Document Reference. Document Reference

customization.description: The identification of an Invoice that was previously sent by the Seller. The prior invoice may exist because of a credit and there may be a requirement to provide the preceding invoice number between two parties.

data.message: Value is not found in code list UNECE-1373.

ubldens.ublden: Billing Reference. Invoice_ Document Reference. Document Reference
Document Reference. Document Status Code. Code

customization.description: The status of the invoice that was previously sent by the Seller.

customization.description: A name by which the Seller is known, other than Seller name (also known as Business name).

customization.description: An identifier for the Seller defined by the Supplier.

customization.description: The means, expressed as code, for how a payment is expected to be or has been settled.

data.assertionPrototype: if (some $code in (17, 18, 28, 29, 30, 32, 33, 35, 36, 39, 40, 41, 43, 48, 49) satisfies normalize-space(.) = string($code) ) then count (../cac:PayeeFinancialAccount/cbc:ID) = 1 else true()

data.message: Period specified is incomplete or the end date and time is not later than the start date and time.
